channel.title: Cartesian Products :: Maximum Mathematics
channel.description: All of the set operations we’ve seen so far simply take some combination of elements from two given sets, and form a new conglomerate set. The same will be true of Cartesian Products. Cartesian Products For all of the set operations we’ve seen so far, we essentially pick out only a subset of elements from each. What’s different about the Cartesian Product is that we iterate over all elements from both sets.
